member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSecurity
member.summary: Encapsulates the information necessary to provide PDF document security and encryption.
member.remarks: If a user password is supplied the viewer application should prompt for a password. If a user password is not supplied no password will be requested to open the document. By correctly supplying either the user password, or the owner password, the user will be able to open the document, decrypt it and display it on the screen. Whether additional operations are allowed on a decrypted document depends on which password (if any) was supplied when the document was opened and on any access restrictions specified using this class's property.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSecurity.Encrypt
member.summary: Determines whether the document is encrypted or not.
member.remarks: You must set this property to true for the document to be encrypted and the permissions enforced.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSecurity.OwnerPassword
member.summary: The owner password that can be entered in the reader that permits full access to the document regardless of the specified user permissions.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSecurity.UserPassword
member.summary: The user password that can be entered in the reader. If this value is left empty they user will not be prompted for a password, however the user will be restricted by the specified permissions.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSecurity.Permissions
member.summary: Specifies the user permissions for the document. The values can be combined using a bitwise OR combination.
member.remarks: By default all permissions are set/allowed.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfPermissions
member.summary: Specifies the permissions available for a PDF document. These values can be combined using a bitwise OR combination.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfPermissions.None
member.summary: You can use this setting alone to specify that none of the other permissions are set. It has no effect if you bitwise or this flag together with the other flags.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfPermissions.AllowPrint
member.summary: Set to permit printing the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is a revision 2 permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfPermissions.AllowModifyContents
member.summary: Set to permit modifying the document’s contents when it is opened with user access permission. Text annotations can still be added or modified. This is a revision 2 permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfPermissions.AllowCopy
member.summary: Set to permit copying text or graphics from the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is a revision 2 permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfPermissions.AllowModifyAnnotations
member.summary: Set to permit adding or modifying annotations in the document when it is opened with user access permission. This permission is a revision 2 or revision 3 permission. Under revision three, the ability to copy/paste document contents is restricted other than what is specified by bit 10 (AllowAccessibleReaders).

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfPermissions.AllowFillIn
member.summary: Set to permit filling in form fields in the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is revision 3 only permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfPermissions.AllowAccessibleReaders
member.summary: Set to permit extracting the text and graphics of the document for accessibility purposes or otherwise (it is most likely for accessibility reasons, but possibly for other “screen reading” purposes) when it is opened with user access permission. This is revision 3 only permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfPermissions.AllowAssembly
member.summary: Set to permit the following operations when the document is opened with user access permission:Insert, rotate, or delete pages, and create bookmarks or thumbnail images even if AllowModifyContents is false. This is revision 3 only permission.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions
member.summary: Encapsulates viewer preferences and document information/metadata for an output PDF document.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.HideToolbar
member.summary: True to hide the viewer application’s toolbars when the document is active. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.HideMenubar
member.summary: True to hide the viewer application’s menu bar when the document is active. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.HideWindowUI
member.summary: True to hide user interface elements in the document’s window (such as scroll bars and navigation controls), leaving only the document’s contents displayed. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.FitWindow
member.summary: True to resize the document’s window to fit the size of the first displayed page. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.CenterWindow
member.summary: True to position the document’s window in the center of the screen. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.DisplayTitle
member.summary: True if the window’s title bar should display the document title taken from the Title entry in the document information/metadata. If this value is false, the title bar should instead display the name of the PDF file containing the document. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.DisplayMode
member.summary: Specifies how the document should be displayed when opened.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.Title
member.summary: The document’s title.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.Author
member.summary: The name of the person who created the document.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.Subject
member.summary: The subject of the document.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.Keywords
member.summary: Keywords associated with the document.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.Application
member.summary: The value that appears for “Application” inside the Document Properties dialog of the PDF viewer application.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.DisplayMode
member.summary: Used to specify .

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.DisplayMode.None
member.summary: Neither document outline nor thumbnail images are visible.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.DisplayMode.Outlines
member.summary: The document outline is visible.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.DisplayMode.Thumbs
member.summary: Thumbnail images are visible. If thumbnails and outline flags are set, thumbnails will be shown.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.DisplayMode.FullScreen
member.summary: Full-screen mode with no menu bar, window controls, or any other window visible.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PrintPresets
member.summary: Specifies the print presets.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PrintPresets.PageScaling
member.summary: Gets or sets the page scaling.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PrintPresets.DuplexMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the duplex mode.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PrintPresets.PaperSourceByPageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the paper source by page size flag.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PrintPresets.PrintPageRange
member.summary: Gets or sets the print page range.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PrintPresets.NumberOfCopies
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of copies.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PageScaling
member.summary: Specifies the page scaling.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PageScaling.Default
member.summary: Uses the application default setting, which is Shrink To Printable Area.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PageScaling.None
member.summary: Prevents automatic scaling to fit the printable area. Use this setting to preserve the scale in engineering documents or the point size required for legal reasons.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.NumberOfCopies
member.summary: Specifies the Number of copies supported by PDF.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.NumberOfCopies.Default
member.summary: Print 1 copy.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.NumberOfCopies.Two
member.summary: Print 2 copies.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.NumberOfCopies.Three
member.summary: Print 3 copies.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.NumberOfCopies.Four
member.summary: Print 4 copies.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.NumberOfCopies.Five
member.summary: Print 5 copies.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.DuplexMode
member.summary: Specifies Printer duplex option. For best results, the selected printer should support duplex printing if you select a duplex option.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.DuplexMode.Simplex
member.summary: Prints on one side of the paper.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.DuplexMode.DuplexFlipLongEdge
member.summary: Prints on both sides of the paper; the paper flips along the long edge.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.DuplexMode.DuplexFlipShortEdge
member.summary: Prints on both sides of the paper; the paper flips along the short edge.

member.summary: Gets/sets image shown on signature.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.SignatureStamp.ImageRectangle
member.summary: Gets/sets area where image should be placed. By default entire signature rectangle will be used.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.SignatureStamp.VisibilityType
member.summary: Gets/sets stamp visibility type.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.VisibilityType
member.summary: Possible visibility types for pdf signature.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.VisibilityType.Invisible
member.summary: Invisible signature, it means no data will be shown on page, but it will be accessible via "Signatures" tab in reader.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.VisibilityType.Text
member.summary: Show only text on signature.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.VisibilityType.Image
member.summary: Show only image on signature.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.VisibilityType.ImageText
member.summary: Show both, image and text.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSignature
member.summary: Contains signing settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSignature.Stamp
member.summary: Gets stamp settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSignature.Certificate
member.summary: Gets/sets the signing certificate.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSignature.SignerName
member.summary:
Gets or sets the name of the person or authority signing the document.
NOTE: This value is used only if it is not possible to extract the name from the signature, for example from the certificate of the signer.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSignature.SigningDateTime
member.summary:
Ges or sets the time of signing.
NOTE: This value is used only if the time of signing is not available in the signature. For example, a time stamp can be embedded in a PKCS#7 binary data object.
By default this property is initialized with the current date and time.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSignature.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the CPU host name or physical location of the signing.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSignature.Reason
member.summary: Gets or sets the reason for the signing, such as "I agree...".

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSignature.ContactInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the information provided by the signer to enable a recipient to contact the signer to verify the signature (for example, a phone number).

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSignature.TimeStamp
member.summary: Gets the settings for TSA server.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSignature.SignatureCertificationLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets Certification level.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSignature.SignatureFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the signature.

member.summary: User ID for TSA server.

member.summary: Password for TSA server.
